languages.text: {n}Беспокойные морщины на лбу Вайса разглаживаются.{/n} "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Я понимаю, что сей обряд — возможно, единственная ваша возможность найти бунтовщиков. Но страшнее ли их козни угрозы обречь все судно на гибель? Не думаю".

{n}The lines on Weisz's brow disappear.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I realise that this ritual may be your only chance of finding the mutineers, but is their plot so threatening as to risk dooming the entire vessel? I do not think so."
languages.original_text: {n}Беспокойные морщины на лбу Вайса разглаживаются.{/n} "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Я понимаю, что сей обряд — возможно, единственная ваша возможность найти бунтовщиков. Но страшнее ли их козни угрозы обречь все судно на гибель? Не думаю".

{n}The lines on Weisz's brow disappear.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I realise that this ritual may be your only chance of finding the mutineers, but is their plot so threatening as to risk dooming the entire vessel? I do not think so."

{n}The lines on Weisz's brow disappear.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I realise that this ritual may be your only chance of finding the mutineers, but is their plot so threatening as to risk dooming the entire vessel? I do not think so."

languages.text: {n}Weisz relaja la frente.{/n} «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Soy consciente de que este ritual podría ser la única forma de encontrar a los amotinados, pero ¿tanta amenaza suponen como para poner en riesgo a toda la nave? Lo dudo».
languages.original_text: {n}The lines on Weisz's brow disappear.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I realise that this ritual may be your only chance of finding the mutineers, but is their plot so threatening as to risk dooming the entire vessel? I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz relaja la frente.{/n} «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Soy consciente de que este ritual podría ser la única forma de encontrar a los amotinados, pero ¿tanta amenaza suponen como para poner en riesgo a toda la nave? Lo dudo».

languages.text: {n}ワイズの眉間のシワが消える。{/n}「ありがとうございます、陛下。この儀式が反逆者を見つけ出す唯一のチャンスであることは承知していますが、船そのものを地獄に落とすほど恐れなければいけないことでしょうか？そうは思えません」
languages.original_text: {n}The lines on Weisz's brow disappear.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I realise that this ritual may be your only chance of finding the mutineers, but is their plot so threatening as to risk dooming the entire vessel? I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: {n}ワイズの眉間のシワが消える。{/n}「ありがとうございます、陛下。この儀式が反逆者を見つけ出す唯一のチャンスであることは承知していますが、船そのものを地獄に落とすほど恐れなければいけないことでしょうか？そうは思えません」

languages.text: {n}威茨额头上的皱纹消失了。{/n}“谢谢您，大人。我明白，这个仪式可能是揪出叛乱分子唯一的机会，但他们的阴谋真的有这么危险，可能会让整艘船都毁于一旦吗？我不这么认为。”
languages.original_text: {n}The lines on Weisz's brow disappear.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I realise that this ritual may be your only chance of finding the mutineers, but is their plot so threatening as to risk dooming the entire vessel? I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: {n}威茨额头上的皱纹消失了。{/n}“谢谢您，大人。我明白，这个仪式可能是揪出叛乱分子唯一的机会，但他们的阴谋真的有这么危险，可能会让整艘船都毁于一旦吗？我不这么认为。”

languages.text: {n}Die Linien auf Weiszs Braue verschwinden.{/n} "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Mir ist klar, dass dieses Ritual möglicherweise Eure einzige Chance ist, die Meuterer zu finden, aber ist ihre Intrige ebenso bedrohlich, wie die Zerstörung des gesamten Schiffes? Ich glaube nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}The lines on Weisz's brow disappear.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I realise that this ritual may be your only chance of finding the mutineers, but is their plot so threatening as to risk dooming the entire vessel? I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Linien auf Weiszs Braue verschwinden.{/n} "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Mir ist klar, dass dieses Ritual möglicherweise Eure einzige Chance ist, die Meuterer zu finden, aber ist ihre Intrige ebenso bedrohlich, wie die Zerstörung des gesamten Schiffes? Ich glaube nicht."

languages.text: {n}Les rides qui striaient le front de Weisz disparaissent.{/n} « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai conscience que ce rituel pourrait bien être votre seule chance d'identifier les mutins, mais leurs manigances sont-elles si menaçantes que vous deviez mettre en péril le vaisseau dans son ensemble ? J'en doute fort. »
languages.original_text: {n}The lines on Weisz's brow disappear.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I realise that this ritual may be your only chance of finding the mutineers, but is their plot so threatening as to risk dooming the entire vessel? I do not think so."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les rides qui striaient le front de Weisz disparaissent.{/n} « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai conscience que ce rituel pourrait bien être votre seule chance d'identifier les mutins, mais leurs manigances sont-elles si menaçantes que vous deviez mettre en péril le vaisseau dans son ensemble ? J'en doute fort. »

languages.text: {n}Weisz'ın alnındaki çizgiler yok oluyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu ayinin isyancıları bulmak için tek şansınız olabileceğinin farkındayım ancak kurdukları komplo, tüm gemiyi riske atacak kadar tehdit teşkil ediyor mu? Sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The lines on Weisz's brow disappear.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I realise that this ritual may be your only chance of finding the mutineers, but is their plot so threatening as to risk dooming the entire vessel? I do not think so."
